select l.lect_id, l.thumbnail as thumbnail, l.name as lect_name, r.score as score, l.usercount as usercount, i.name as inst_name, (l.usercount*l.price) as total_profit , l.availability as availability from lecture l join review r on l.lect_id=r.lect_id join instructor i on i.inst_id=l.inst_id join category c on c.cat_id=l.cat_id where l.approval=1
and c.name = #{categoryName}
